page.title: 19The Crown Inn
page.content: On Thursday we went down to the Crown Inn to get some notes about the pub. The first question we asked was did they come to Blockley or were they sent.They said they chose to come because they thought it was a nice place. The opening hours are 11.00 2.30 and from 7.00 to 11.00. On Sunday it is 12.00 to 2.00 and 7.00 to 10.30 The busiest days were Friday and Saturday. They have not always been publicans. They do alot of work before they open and after they close.They would like to see a through road.They think that would improve their trade. They do sell food.The people that go there are mostly local and they do have some tourists. To work in a pub you have to be a hard working person and as the landlord said "mad"!
